subject: College Athletics
Football
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: With the N.C.A.A. forcing Penn State to vacate 111 of Joe Paterno’s victories, Grambling’s Eddie Robinson is No. 1 all time in Division I, and Bobby Bowden among major-college coaches.
snippet: With the N.C.A.A. forcing Penn State to vacate 111 of Joe Paterno’s victories, Grambling’s Eddie Robinson is No. 1 all time in Division I, and Bobby Bowden among major-college coaches.
